sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Container, Typography, Card, CardContent } from '@mui/material';

const Home = () => {
  return (
    <Box sx={{ 
      minHeight: '100vh',
      background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #f8fdf9 0%, #e8f5e8 100%)',
      py: 3
    }}>
      <Container maxWidth="lg">
        {/* Header */}
        <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', mb: 4 }}>
          <Typography variant="h3" component="h1" sx={{ 
            fontWeight: 800,
            background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #0d7e3d 0%, #2ecc71 100%)',
            backgroundClip: 'text',
            WebkitBackgroundClip: 'text',
            WebkitTextFillColor: 'transparent',
            mb: 1
          }}>
            MuslimDaily
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="h6" color="text.secondary">
            Your Free Daily Practice Companion ðŸ•Œ
          </Typography>
        </Box>

        {/* Welcome Card */}
        <Card sx={{ borderRadius: 3, boxShadow: 3, mb: 3 }}>
          <CardContent sx={{ textAlign: 'center', py: 4 }}>
            <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
              ðŸŽ‰ Welcome to MuslimDaily!
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1" color="text.secondary" paragraph>
              Track your daily prayers, Quran reading, and Islamic practices. 
              Completely free forever!
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body2" color="primary.main">
              Features coming soon: Prayer times, Progress tracking, Achievements
            </Typography>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>

        {/* Quick Stats */}
        <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 2, flexWrap: 'wrap' }}>
          <Card sx={{ flex: 1, minWidth: 200, borderRadius: 3 }}>
            <CardContent sx={{ textAlign: 'center' }}>
              <Typography variant="h2">ðŸ•Œ</Typography>
              <Typography variant="h6">Prayer Tracker</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                Track 5 daily prayers
              </Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>

          <Card sx={{ flex: 1, minWidth: 200, borderRadius: 3 }}>
            <CardContent sx={{ textAlign: 'center' }}>
              <Typography variant="h2">ðŸ“–</Typography>
              <Typography variant="h6">Quran Reading</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                Daily reading tracker
              </Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>

          <Card sx={{ flex: 1, minWidth: 200, borderRadius: 3 }}>
            <CardContent sx={{ textAlign: 'center' }}>
              <Typography variant="h2">ðŸ“¿</Typography>
              <Typography variant="h6">Dhikr Counter</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                Remember Allah daily
              </Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Box>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Home;
